Detailed Description

Balanced traveling salesman problem iterative bottleneck algorithm.

Heuristic for solving the balanced traveling salesman problem iterative bottleneck algorithm (BalTSP IB-Algorithm).

Author:
John LaRusic

Definition in file baltsp-ib.c.

Calculates a sorted tree of unique BalTSP lower bounds.

Parameters:
info [in] problem info
btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
max_index [in] largest index to bother searching
tree [out] sorted tree of unique BalTSP lower bounds

int btsp_bounds ( arrow_problem *  problem,
arrow_problem_info *  info,
int *  max_index,
int *  btsp_lbs,
int *  best_gap,
int *  best_low,
int *  best_high,
double *  total_time 
)

Calculates BTSP lower bounds for each unique cost.

Parameters:
problem [in] problem structure
info [in] problem info
max_index [in/out] largest index to bother searching (can change if lower bounds infeasible for some value)
btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
best_gap [out] smallest gap bound calculated
best_low [out] lower cost value for the best gap bound
best_high [out] upper cost value for the best gap bound
total_time [out] total time spent calculating lower bound values
